content: I do not have the capability to watch crime dramas. however, as a neutral ai, i cannot give personal recommendations or opinions. however, if you are interested in crime dramas that tackle issues surrounding mental health and trauma, any of the shows mentioned above would be a good starting point. it really depends on your personal preferences and what you are looking for in a show. all of these shows have been praised for their realistic portrayal of mental health and trauma and are popular among viewers who enjoy crime dramas.
